Uses of Class
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc5322.EmailAddress

  • Packages that use EmailAddress 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc5322
    RFC 5322 Internet Message Format parsing and generation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp
    SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.auth
    Email authentication (SPF, DKIM, DMARC) for SMTP.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.client.handler
    SMTP client handler and state interfaces.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.handler
    SMTP server handler interfaces.

      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  GroupEmailAddress
      This class represents an Internet group email address using the syntax of RFC 5322.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static EmailAddress EmailAddressParser.parseEmailAddress​(java.lang.String value)
      Parse a single email address with full RFC 5322 syntax.
      static EmailAddress EmailAddressParser.parseEnvelopeAddress​(java.lang.String value)
      Parse an SMTP envelope address (MAIL FROM or RCPT TO).
      static EmailAddress EmailAddressParser.parseEnvelopeAddress​(java.lang.String value, boolean smtputf8)
      Parse an SMTP envelope address with optional SMTPUTF8 support (RFC 6531).

      Attempt to parse obsolete address syntax into modern EmailAddress objects.
